Class PowerPoint

java.lang.Object
  db3.PowerPoint

public class PowerPoint
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a Power Point presentation

 int howManySlides()
          Returns the number of slides in the slide show
 void writePresentation()
          Writes the presentation to the file (Before this, the entire presentation is held in memory - Only when this method is called is the presentation written to the file and the file is closed)

Returns the number of slides in the slide show

Returns:

writePresentation

public void writePresentation()
                       throws java.io.IOException
Writes the presentation to the file (Before this, the entire presentation is held in memory - Only when this method is called is the presentation written to the file and the file is closed)

Throws:
java.io.IOException

addImage

public void addImage(java.lang.String fname,
                     int w,
                     int h,
                     int posx,
                     int posy)
Adds an image to the current slide - only jpg supported

Parameters:
fname - image file name
w - width of the image
h - height of the image
posx - position on x dimension where the image should be placed
posy - position on the y dimension where the image should be placed
